summary: The diff does not show any implementation of the required `http_request` HTTP interface or routing/CORS behavior in `backend/main.mo` (the visible portion contains only game/player logic). Additionally, `project_state.json` was modified even though the BuildRequest did not request project state metadata changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add `public query func http_request(req : HttpRequest) : async HttpResponse` in `backend/main.mo` and route based on `req.method` and URL path parsed from `req.url` (ignoring query string).
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the provided/truncated `backend/main.mo` diff that `http_request` exists or that URL path parsing/routing was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement exact method+path routing: OPTIONS->204 empty; GET /health->200 {"ok":true}; GET /auth/google/start->200 {"ok":true,"message":"google start reached"}; GET /auth/google/callback->200 {"ok":true,"message":"google callback reached"}; else 404 {"error":"not_found"}.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the provided/truncated `backend/main.mo` diff of these routes, status codes, or exact JSON bodies.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add CORS headers to every `http_request` response (including 204 and 404): Allow-Origin *, Allow-Methods GET,POST,PUT,OPTIONS, Allow-Headers Content-Type, Authorization, X-ADMIN-TOKEN.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the provided/truncated `backend/main.mo` diff that any HTTP responses (or headers) are being constructed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Disable/remove HTML landing page fallback from the canister HTTP handler so no path returns HTML; non-matching routes return JSON 404 instead.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the provided/truncated `backend/main.mo` diff that an existing HTML fallback was removed or that 404 JSON fallback was added.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; no HTML handler/fallback changes shown)

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for backend HTTP routing changes in `backend/main.mo` and explicitly says frontend paths are not needed; it does not request updating project state metadata.
